          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",

          "created_time": 1552101194938,
          "id": "a350af60-b92a-4015-91fa-50b975774a8d",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1552101194938,
          "parent_id": "11bc7425-7580-414a-bd2f-bfb5df8bf8b5",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "# a class method (same as the above example)\nclass Thing\n  class << self # the anonymous class\n    def hello(name)\n      puts \"Hello, #{name}!\"\n    end\n  end\nend\n\nThing.hello(\"sarah\") # => Hello, sarah!\n\n# singleton method\n\nclass Thing\nend\n\nthing1 = Thing.new\n\nclass << thing1\n  def makestuff\n    puts \"I belong to thing one\"\n  end\nend\n\nthing1.makestuff # => prints: \"I belong to thing one\""
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
